context_bundle.summary: Rust MCP scanner missing category due to hardcoded array

onboarding.quick_start: When adding new categories, check for hardcoded category arrays in scanner code
symptoms: Index rebuild shows fewer entries than filesystem
New category doors not appearing in searches
Stats tool shows wrong category count

root_cause.location: Usually in loader.rs or scanner module

diagnosis.step_2: Compare to index count from MCP stats tool
diagnosis.step_3: If mismatch, grep for hardcoded category arrays

fix.add_category: Add missing category string to array

real_example.bug: LANGUAGES category (50 doors) missing from scan
